name: @wix-pilot/web-utils
description: Driver utils for Wix Pilot usage

scripts.bump-version:patch: npm version patch && git commit -am 'chore: bump patch version' && git push
scripts.release:patch: npm run test && npm run bump-version:patch && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.bump-version:minor: npm version minor && git commit -am 'chore: bump minor version' && git push
scripts.release:minor: npm run test && npm run bump-version:minor && npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.bump-version:major: npm version major && git commit -am 'chore: bump major version' && git push
scripts.release:major: npm run test && npm run bump-version:major && npm run build && npm publish --access public
